pageProps.title: Network Traffic Analysis with Python: A Beginner's Guide
pageProps.metaDesc: If you've ever wondered how to analyze network traffic with Python, then this beginner's guide is for you. With Python, it's possible to capture and analyze network packets in real-time, which can help you gain insights into your network's behavior and identify potential security threats. In this article, we'll cover the basics of network traffic analysis with Python, including how to capture and decode packets, as well as some tools and libraries you can use to make the process easier.
